entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 6.

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 3.

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few showers beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
